title: FreeRide - carpooling and ride booking

description.title: FreeRide
description.lead: Offer and book rides easily. Google Maps helps you pick locations, and AI suggests an optimised route.

tutorial.title: Carpooling with Google Maps + AI
tutorial.intro: FreeRide is a carpooling app that lets you quickly find a ride or offer spare seats. Built-in maps simplify planning, and AI route optimisation helps you travel smarter.
benefits: Quick ride offers and easy bookings.
Choose pick-up and drop-off points on the map.
AI can suggest a better route and stop order.
Clear ride details: time, distance, estimated route.
Great for commutes and occasional trips.

how.title: How it works
how.caption: Example flow
items: Choose: offer a ride or book a ride.
Set start and destination on the map (Google Maps).
Add details: time, available seats, notes.
Search matches or publish your offer.
Book the ride and connect with the driver/passengers.

strategy.title: Tips & optimisation
strategy.intro: Increase match chances and reduce travel time:
strategy.caption: Practical tips
items: Use accurate pick-up/drop-off points – maps do the heavy lifting.
Add a pickup time buffer during rush hours.
Use AI suggestions when you have multiple stops.
Clarify luggage and ride rules in the description.
Update your offer if time or route changes.

features.title: Key features
features.caption: What FreeRide can do
features.p: FreeRide combines simple listings with maps and smart planning:
items: Create ride offers and book in a few clicks.
AI suggestions for route and stop order optimisation.
Ride details: time, distance, estimated route.

data.title: Data storage
data.p1: FreeRide stores only the data required to run core carpooling features (e.g., ride offers, bookings, and user settings).
data.p2: You can delete your account at any time or request data deletion by contacting us.
